ARCHIVE_VAULT.heading: Archive Vault
ARCHIVE_VAULT.tagline: Index trade ledgers, cultural briefs, and decrypted relics.
paragraphs: Archive Vault layers revision control over every recovered asset, from star charts to oral histories.
Correlate artifacts, surface cross-links, and expose provenance trails instantly.
heroHighlights: Timeline view for custody and annotations

sections.title: 1.4 Update
options: Restoration queue can now auto-balance across vault clusters.
Knowledge graph exports include embedded verification hashes.
Offline kits receive prioritized sync plans when reconnecting.

ARCHIVE_VAULT.statusMessage: Vault integrity sweep underway. Sync window opening shortly.

media.title: Trade Accord 73A
media.description: Recovered treaty scanned from diplomatic archive shards.

media.title: Relic Diagnostic Log
media.description: Spectral readings attached to decrypted vault objects.

media.title: Cultural Field Brief
media.description: Transcribed oral histories tagged with location metadata.

SETTINGS.heading: Settings Console
SETTINGS.tagline: Personalize the Colony interface to match your mission tempo.
paragraphs: Choose from curated color harmonies tuned for clarity in dim command decks or bright observation bays.
Switch schemes at any time to align with the crew mood or the operations cycle.
heroHighlights: Unified palette preview across navigation, library, and hero panels
Instant theme application without restarting the console
Catppuccin, Gruvbox, Solarized, Everblush, Cyberdream, and One Dark presets
SETTINGS.statusMessage: Select a palette to update the interface chroma.
